title: runtime/windows: GetQueuedCompletionStatusEx unavailable on Windows XP/Server 2003
body:
by **0x6a67**: 
After https://golang.org/cl/74790043 runtime unconditionally imports
GetQueuedCompletionStatusEx, which is supported starting from Windows Vista/Server 2008.
See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa364988%28v=vs.85%29.aspx
